players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice was killed, so Diana or Charlie is mafia. Let's discuss who we suspect."
Charlie: "Alice was killed. I investigated Diana last night and found that she is the mafia. We need to vote her out."
Diana: "That's a lie, Charlie. I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafia. Charlie is trying to frame me."
Diana: "Charlie is lying about investigating me. If he were the detective, why would he investigate me instead of the more suspicious Bob? He's trying to mislead us."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. She's trying to deflect suspicion by falsely accusing me or Bob. We must vote her out."
You: "I believe Charlie is the detective. Diana's claim to have investigated me doesn't add up - why would she investigate a villager night 1?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Charlie is lying about investigating me. If he were the detective, why would he investigate me instead of the more suspicious Bob? He's trying to mislead us."
You: "Diana is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. She's trying to deflect suspicion by falsely accusing me or Bob. We must vote her out."
Bob: "I believe Charlie is the detective. Diana's claim to have investigated me doesn't add up - why would she investigate a villager night 1?"

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Alice was killed, so Diana or Charlie is mafia. Let's discuss who we suspect."
Charlie: "Alice was killed. I investigated Diana last night and found that she is the mafia. We need to vote her out."
You: "That's a lie, Charlie. I investigated Bob last night and he's the mafia. Charlie is trying to frame me."
You: "Charlie is lying about investigating me. If he were the detective, why would he investigate me instead of the more suspicious Bob? He's trying to mislead us."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafia. My investigation confirmed it. She's trying to deflect suspicion by falsely accusing me or Bob. We must vote her out."
Bob: "I believe Charlie is the detective. Diana's claim to have investigated me doesn't add up - why would she investigate a villager night 1?"
